d1_flags: 1. goto EF5DF8 if LEARNED_ABOUT_UNDERWORLD_GEYSERS is set
d1_text:
Npc1287:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG LEARNED_ABOUT_UNDERWORLD_GEYSERS L_EF5DF8]
[SET_FLAG LEARNED_ABOUT_UNDERWORLD_GEYSERS]
ï¿½You're strange, but you smell good.[PAUSE 20]  So I'll tell you a secret.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Did you feel the earthquake a little while ago?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...You know, we have earthquakes all the time here.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½After an earthquake, the hot springs will erupt.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The blue springs are great for recovering health.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The Red springs are perfect for healing paralysis or drawing out poison.[HALT][END]
